description: Discover the power of our latest update! With the new Page Info feature, effortlessly manage your projects on a personal level. Subscribe to our AFFiNE AI for improved writing, presenting, and planning. Say goodbye to pesky bugs and hello to a smoother experience.
md:
Our latest 0.13.0 version brings the **Page Info** feature, perfect for boosting project management on a personal level. Plus, our **AFFiNE AI** are now available for subscription, which facilitates enhanced writing, presentation, planning, and more. We've also tackled those annoying bugs, ensuring a smoother ride. Let's dive in and experience productivity at its finest! # **New features released in 0.13.0 version** ## **Page info: Direct Insight into Progress** Simplistic field types come up short for modern knowledge bases that require 'modeling various types of documents' -- that can be your favorite reading list, movie archive, or academic papers . etc **On the AFFiNE Roadmap, our focus lies in fully integrating all database fields into document metadata.** We're progressively enhancing document indexing and bulk management through database blocks. Presently, you have the flexibility to incorporate any database field into the document page info. This enables a clear presentation of essential details like deadlines or tasks right at the outset of the document, streamlining personal project management. Consequently, your team can locate required documents more efficiently. Furthermore, with the introduction of the 'custom properties' feature, you can tailor how information is displayed. You have the option to reveal or conceal it in the view, or selectively unveil it when pertinent content is present. In our latest version 0.13.0, we've updated this feature, paving the way for seamless integration of page info with collections and the 'all pages' view in forthcoming updates. # **AFFiNE AI: Transforming Ideas into Visuals and Words Seamlessly** **Explore AFFiNE AI, your true multimodal AI copilot, dedicated to turning "all your ideas into reality.** 1. **Write Together**: Leveraging AI technology, AFFiNE AI provides intelligent assistance for every step of your writing process, from crafting sentences to entire articles. Whether you're creating content, professionally rewriting, adjusting tone, or correcting spelling and grammar, AFFiNE AI makes your text more vivid and accurate. 1. **Create Together**: Harnessing the capabilities of AI, AFFiNE AI empowers you to turn your sketches or concepts into captivating visual presentations. Whether you're crafting slideshows or designing presentations, AFFiNE AI facilitates clear expression and seamless sharing of your creative ideas. 1. **Plan Together**: AFFiNE AI offers intelligent mind mapping tools to assist you in structuring and visualizing your ideas effortlessly with simple instructions. With automatic sorting and tagging features, it simplifies knowledge management and organization. **Join our waiting list now to be among the first to experience the leap in creativity and efficiency brought by AFFiNE AI！** ## **Bugs Fixed:** * fix: backlinks jump * fix(core): fix page priority load * fix(core): make sidebar switch transition smooth * fix(core): remove unexpected loading * fix(core): cannot scroll when dragging # **Get Ready to Unlock New Levels of Productivity** As we continue our journey of refinement, we extend our sincere gratitude for your interest and support. Our commitment to enhancing AFFiNE remains steadfast, and we are fully dedicated to its continuous improvement. We also invite you to stay connected with us on Product Hunt. Your support, through follows and upvotes, truly makes a difference. Your engagement is invaluable to us. Discover more about AFFiNE, an all-in-one workspace designed for both productivity and creativity, at [https://www.producthunt.com/posts/affine-3.](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/affine-3)
